title: Wikidata-Labels-to-IUPAC Conversion Dataset
description: Conversion of Wikidata labels to IUPAC names using OPSIN with InChIKey validation

creators.name: Adriano Rutz
creators.affiliation: ETH Zurich, Institute for Molecular Systems Biology, Otto-Stern-Weg 3, 8093 Zurich, Switzerland (ROR: https://ror.org/03j5gm982)
